title: Ultra-low lattice thermal conductivity realizing ultra-high performance Bi0.48Sb1.52Te3-based thermoelectric material and module
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6091-6101
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02008A, Paper
Hongtao Li, Lidong Chen, Zhe Guo, Gang Wu, Xiaojian Tan, Qiang Zhang, Jianfeng Cai, Qianqian Sun, Jacques G. Noudem, Peng Sun, Jiehua Wu, Guo-Qiang Liu, Jun Jiang
By adding “weakly-active” SGPT and Cu, differentiated electro-phonon scattering centers are induced to significantly suppress κph with μ less affected, leading to a ZTave of 1.32 and a η of 6.8%.
